content.en: Voltage Optimization: Researchers have been investigating how algorithms can actively control voltage in distribution power systems with distributed energy resources. They have proposed various algorithms, such as dynamic programming, control rules and optimization algorithms, adaptive Tabu search, and multi-objective differential evolution, to optimize voltage control and achieve the best balance between economic cost and acceptable capacity of distributed generation. These algorithms aim to improve the coordination and regulation of voltage in distribution networks, ensuring efficient and reliable operation.
content.da: Spændingsoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer kan aktivt styre spændingen i fordelingssystemer med distribuerede energikilder. De har foreslået forskellige algoritmer, såsom dynamisk programmering, styringsregler og optimeringsalgoritmer, adaptiv Tabu-søgning og multiobjektiv differensiel evolution, for at optimere spændingsstyringen og opnå den bedste balance mellem økonomiske omkostninger og acceptabel kapacitet for distribueret generation. Disse algoritmer har til formål at forbedre koordineringen og reguleringen af spændingen i distributionsnetværk, hvilket sikrer effektiv og pålidelig drift.
